mapper.select: SELECT T1.SVPD_PD_CD , T1.SVPD_NM_KOR , T1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 FROM () T1 WHERE T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND IN ('08', '13')

SELECT T1.MNGT_YM , T1.CSMB_PD_CD , T1.ITM_KNM , T1.MNGT_UNIT_CD , T1.GO_DV_CD , T1.GO_UPRC , T1.BOX_UNIT_QTY , T1.RMK_CN , T2.NWCMR_ORT_YN , T2.NWCMR_TP_CD , T2.NWCMR_CMPT_BASE , T2.NWCMR_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , T2.NWCMR_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , T2.NWCMR_UNIT_ACC_N , T2.NWCMR_UNIT_QTY , T2.NWCMR_APLC_LM_QTY , T2.NWCMR_SORT_ODR , T3.INDV_ORT_YN , T3.INDV_TP_CD , T3.INDV_CMPT_BASE , T3.INDV_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , T3.INDV_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , T3.INDV_UNIT_ACC_N , T3.INDV_UNIT_QTY , T3.INDV_APLC_LM_QTY , T3.INDV_SORT_ODR , T4.BLD_ORT_YN , T4.BLDV_TP_CD , T4.BLD_CMPT_BASE , T4.BLD_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , T4.BLD_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , T4.BLD_UNIT_ACC_N , T4.BLD_UNIT_QTY , T4.BLD_APLC_LM_QTY , T4.BLD_SORT_ODR FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_BAS T1 , (SELECT A.MNGT_YM , A.CSMB_PD_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AS NWCMR_ORT_YN , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD AS NWCMR_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_CMPT_BASE_CD AS NWCMR_CMPT_BASE , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_PD_GRP_CD AS NWCMR_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_ACC_TP_CD AS NWCMR_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_ACC_N AS NWCMR_UNIT_ACC_N , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_QTY AS NWCMR_UNIT_QTY , A.BFSVC_CSMB_APLC_LM_QTY AS NWCMR_APLC_LM_QTY , A.SORT_ODR AS NWCMR_SORT_ODR FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL A WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '1' AND A.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND A.CSMB_PD_CD = #{csmbPdCd} ) T2 , (SELECT A.MNGT_YM , A.CSMB_PD_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AS INDV_ORT_YN , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD AS INDV_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_CMPT_BASE_CD AS INDV_CMPT_BASE , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_PD_GRP_CD AS INDV_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_ACC_TP_CD AS INDV_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_ACC_N AS INDV_UNIT_ACC_N , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_QTY AS INDV_UNIT_QTY , A.BFSVC_CSMB_APLC_LM_QTY AS INDV_APLC_LM_QTY , A.SORT_ODR AS INDV_SORT_ODR FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL A WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '2' AND A.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND A.CSMB_PD_CD = #{csmbPdCd} ) T3 , (SELECT A.MNGT_YM , A.CSMB_PD_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AS BLD_ORT_YN , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD AS BLDV_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_CMPT_BASE_CD AS BLD_CMPT_BASE , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_PD_GRP_CD AS BLD_OJ_PD_GRP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_ACC_TP_CD AS BLD_OJ_ACC_TP_CD , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_ACC_N AS BLD_UNIT_ACC_N , A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_UNIT_QTY AS BLD_UNIT_QTY , A.BFSVC_CSMB_APLC_LM_QTY AS BLD_APLC_LM_QTY , A.SORT_ODR AS BLD_SORT_ODR FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL A WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '3' AND A.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND A.CSMB_PD_CD = #{csmbPdCd} ) T4 WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.MNGT_YM = T2.MNGT_YM AND T1.CSMB_PD_CD = T2.CSMB_PD_CD AND T1.MNGT_YM = T3.MNGT_YM AND T1.CSMB_PD_CD = T3.CSMB_PD_CD AND T1.MNGT_YM = T4.MNGT_YM AND T1.CSMB_PD_CD = T4.CSMB_PD_CD AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T1.CSMB_PD_CD = #{csmbPdCd}
